ValidationRule.description: Block Status update once invoice is posted
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Zumzum__Status__c ), 'Posted') , ISCHANGED(Zumzum__Status__c ) ) , true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Purchase Invoice is locked and prevents you from changing the status once it has been Posted to the ledger. Please consider creating a Purchase Credit to reverse this transaction or consult your accountant for advice.
